title: Mr Jingle at Dingley Dell
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Literature - Study and teaching
description: Episode of Series "Tales from Charles Dickens". On their way to Dingley Dell, Mr Pickwick and his friends meet the rascally Alfred Jingle, with his unusual telegraphic style of speech. Tells how Jingle hoodwinks them all, ingratiates himself with Miss Rachel Wardell, elopes with her in the middle of the night, and is finally apprehended by Mr Pickwick. Adapted from Charles Dickens "The Pickwick Papers". Narrated by Fredric March.
related_objects: Series; S00727; Tales from Charles Dickens; Active
